Package hep.io.root.util

Some utilities for use with Root.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
InterfaceBuilder Builds a Java interface corresponding to a RootClass.
RootDirectoryTreeCellRenderer A TreeCellRenderer for Root TNamed objects.
RootDirectoryTreeModel An adaptor that converts a root TDirectory into a TreeModel, allowing any directory structure to be dislayed by a Swing JTree.
RootHistogramBrowser A simple application for browsing histograms in Root Files
RootObjectBrowser A simple application for browsing the contents of Root Files
RootObjectTreeCellRenderer A TreeCellRenderer for use with RootObjectTreeModel.
RootObjectTreeModel An adaptor which converts a RootObject to a TreeModel.
StreamerInfoTreeCellRenderer A TreeCellRenderer for StreamerInfo objects.
StreamerInfoTreeModel A tree model for viewing StreamerInfo in a root file
 

Package hep.io.root.util Description

Some utilities for use with Root. These are not part of the base package, but provide some useful additional functionality, such as the ability to display root files in a tree.
